name: Phantom Pain
description:
TRIGGER WARNING: DEPRESSION, MEDICATION.

How to play:
Up - Up Arrow / W
Down - Down Arrow / S
Left - Left Arrow / A
Right - Right Arrow / D
A - Alt / Z / J
B - Ctrl / K / X
Start - Enter

SAVE by sitting on chairs and couches XD

UPDATE: bathroom bug fixed. Now polished. 20191128

Hi! This wasn't my original entry for the YuriGameJam, but it ended up happening first, so I'll hold the other game for next year maybe... [it's a happy game, don't worry]
Realy short game about a person (the gender is up to you!) dealing with a breakup. Kinda sad and horror-ish, 2 endings, a sad one for the player and a happy one for the lesbians! This GBStudio games are very personal and very catartic to me, so if you don't like it, a have a bunch of other games about lesbians being happy with each other, enjoy!
